title: Example: Add workspace health badge to README
description: This is a demonstration proposal showing the Enhancement Bot's JSON format. It serves as a template for future proposals. The associated script is a no-op that logs its execution. In a real proposal, the script would perform an actual improvement like fixing typos, updating documentation, or cleaning up stale files.
result:
=== Example Enhancement Bot Script ===
This script would perform a real improvement if this were a real proposal.
For demonstration purposes, it simply logs and exits successfully.

Proposal: Add workspace health badge to README
Status: Would have updated README.md with health metrics badge

 Enhancement proposals should:
  - Be idempotent (safe to run multiple times)
  - Include validation (check that changes took effect)
  - Exit 0 on success, non-zero on failure

Example completed successfully.
